description: A collection of related, runnable tests, either individually or themselves in subgroups

description.description: A (human-readable) short description of this test group

comment.description: Any additional comments about the test group

schema.$comment: the URI used here is a sort of 'magic' URI set by Bowtie during runs, which will resolve to (effectively) the meta-schema for the current dialect being run by Bowtie. E.g. when running tests using the Draft 2020-12 dialect, the URI will resolve to the schema `{"$ref": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema"}`. This sort of dynamically set value is necessary, as schemas are supposed to be valid under the current dialect being spoken by Bowtie, but that's not known until runtime.

registry.description: A schema registry to be made available for all tests in this group.

children.description: A set of related children of this test group

oneOf.description: a leaf test group (whose children are tests, and which therefore declares a schema for its children)
an outer test group (whose children are further test groups)
